channel.title: Comments on: Two Website Makeovers: Barnes & Noble And Newsweek

item.title: By: Newsweek.com Redesgin: Your Dam For The Flood » Design, Digital Media » Russell Heimlich

item.description: [...] folks at Newsweek unveiled a new redesign for their website today, nearly one and a half years since their last one. From a post about the new changes, the redesign aims to help visitors sift through the [...]
